org.jgentleframework.utils
Class SystemPropertiesUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.jgentleframework.utils.SystemPropertiesUtils

public abstract class SystemPropertiesUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Miscellaneous System Properties (System.getProperty(String)) utility methods.

Mainly for use within the framework, but also useful for application code.

Author:
Quoc Chung - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

getProperty

public static java.lang.String getProperty(SystemPropertyKeys propertyKey)
Returns the result of key via System.getProperty(String) method

Parameters:

getProperty

public static java.lang.String getProperty(SystemPropertyKeys propertyKey,
                                           java.lang.String defaultValue)
Returns the result of key via System.getProperty(String, String) method

Parameters:
propertyKey - the specified key
defaultValue - the default value if there is no property with that key or System.getProperty(String) returns null.
Returns:
the string value of the system property, or the default value if there is no property with that key or System.getProperty(String) method returns null.
